relatedBlades.title: Complimentary Zero Trust and Phishing Risk Assessment
relatedBlades.copy:
# __Phishing Risk Assessment__

Discover which phishing attacks are evading your current security controls â€“ at no cost and with no impact to your end users.

Sign up for your complimentary phishing risk assessment and see, in real-time, what phishing and business email compromise (BEC) attacks are getting through your existing email defenses. The assessment requires no hardware or software installation and will not impact mail flow.

How it works
- __Deploy in minutes.__ Cloudflare's cloud email security (CES) solution is a fully elastic cloud service. Get set up in five minutes with flexible connection options that don't impact mail flow.
- __Get real-time threat updates.__ Gain full access to the dashboard to review detection metrics and forensics. Receive real-time updates on incidents that require immediate attention.
- __Take action on missed phish.__ With an optional inline deployment, you can take immediate action on missed BEC and phishing attacks.

# __90-Minute Zero Trust Assessment__

Implementing Zero Trust security best practices can be a complex, multi-stage journey. Just getting started can feel intimidating.

In a live 90-minute assessment, Cloudflare experts will help you prioritize what use cases to tackle first and begin developing your long-term roadmap, so you can begin modernizing security across your enterprise with confidence.

During the session, our team will collaborate with yours on the following goals:
- __Identify challenges of existing architecture:__ We will evaluate your current security architecture to identify existing pain points, vulnerabilities, and inefficiencies. 
- __Begin building a business case:__ We will help you articulate the impact of Zero Trust security on your business and its strategic priorities
- Map a migration plan: We will outline step-by-step guidance to transition from your current state to your aspirational state.
- __Find your starting point:__ We will identity what key problems to solve first, so you can begin realizing value as quickly as possible
